title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=dab56a83877ffe7dc6fd93767a8f63e9c366e592
comments:
Name of company: Personal sole proprietorship, currently in the process of registering a LLP

Location: remote

Requirement: freelance writer with an interest in tech or formula 1. It is not a permanent job but a freelance role (the writer will be assigned articles and paid for them at a fixed rate. The work is remote and requires only submitting the article by the deadline. Can provide more info with over email.

Way of contact: DM me and I'll send you the business email id, would be great if you could send some of your previous work too.
Anyone here work in Digital Trust, KPMG India?

Name: Invenco

Location: Auckland, New Zealand

Requirements: Hiring web developers (Node.js, React, .NET). We will sponsor your visa and you must be willing to relocate once the borders open for non-residents. 

Preferred way to contact me: DM or Apply for the job mentioning Reddit India.
We're looking for intermediate, senior and principal devs

Name of the company - Technociate Solutions

Location : Bangalore

Requirements : network engineers. Freshers with any degree and basic networking concepts can apply.

Preferred way of contacting you : DM me. I will share contact details.
Is this a proper 9-5 full time job or a part time job ?
Not full time job, part-time remote work with no fixed schedule just deadlines for the content, paid based on assignments etc.
I dont have prior experience in writing about both topics. Can I apply ?

If you have an interest in the subject and can write based on our guidelines, or if you have any previous writing experience, we can definitely consider working with you. Can DM you the email to reach out to and we can talk further!

I want to enter the data analyst field and currently learning excel (knows pivot, index match a bit of macros and power query) with full time job. I am willing to learn the necessary tools on the job.

Its hard to enter this field without experience. Do let me know if you have any entry level roles in business/data analyst roles.
2. None yet but building one to track daily expenses with a small dashboard.
3. Hyderabad
4. DM
